source_sentence: 爾時地藏菩薩住在南方瑠璃世界。
translation: It was then that Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva stayed in the southern lapis lazuli world.

source_sentence: 以淨天眼觀地獄之中受苦眾生。
translation: With the pure divine eye, he observes suffering sentient beings in hell.

source_sentence: 鐵碓擣鐵磨磨鐵犁耕鐵鋸解。
translation: It's made of iron, milled with iron, ground with iron, plowed with iron, cultivated with iron, and cut with an iron saw.
The cauldron boils and the ferocious fire rises up in the morning sky.
When he's hungry, he swallows a hot iron ball.
They were thirsty to drink copper juice.
They experience all kinds of pain and suffering without cease.
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva couldn't bear to see it.
He came from the south and entered hell.

source_sentence: 與閻羅王共同一處別床而座。
translation: He sat on a separate seat in the same place as King Yama.
There are four kinds of causes and conditions.

source_sentence: 一者恐閻羅王斷罪不憑。
translation: One, they're afraid that the king of Yama will stop sins and won't rely on them.
Second, it's because they're afraid the text and case will be mixed up.
Three, it's not yet combined with death.

source_sentence: 四者受罪了出地獄池邊。
translation: Fourth, he'll be punished and released from the edge of the hell's pond.

He made an image of Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva.
He wrote the Earth-Store Bodhisattva Sutra.
It's also the name of the bodhisattva Mindfulness of the Earth-Store.

source_sentence: 此人定得往生西方極樂世界。
translation: This person will surely be reborn in the Western paradise world.
From one buddha land to another buddha land, he'll go from one buddha land to another buddha land.
It's from one heaven to another heaven.
Suppose someone creates an image of Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 此人定得往生西方極樂世界。
translation: This person will surely be reborn in the Western paradise world.
On the day this person gives up his life.
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva came to greet him in person.

source_sentence: 常得與地藏菩薩共同一處。
translation: They'll always be able to share the same place with Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 聞佛所說皆大歡喜信受奉行。
translation: Hearing what the Buddha teaches, they all rejoice greatly and faithfully accept it and venerate it.
